column4: @WakeForest @PresidentHatch Expel student unless she got in during RD or B4. If volleyball took her off wait list, she cheated. Ferguson got slots 4 his team. Did he sell 1 to her parents? Either way, the student knew better when she accepted an underserved spot on the VB team. #CollegeAdmissionScandal
